title: [QUESTION] Will SkiaSharp support SKParagraph
body:
Hello,

will SkiaSharp support [SKParagraph](https://github.com/google/skia/tree/master/modules/skparagraph) or stay with [RichTextKit](https://github.com/toptensoftware/RichTextKit) for rendering texts or aren't both related and I have understand it completely wrong?

Thank you for your answer.

Best regards,
Dirk
